thread.title: Sony Pictures Settles With Former Workers in Data Breach Lawsuit
thread.title_full: Sony Pictures Settles With Former Workers in Data Breach Lawsuit - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: Sony Pictures Settles With Former Workers in Data Breach Lawsuit
text:
LOS ANGELESâ€”Former Sony Pictures Entertainment employees whose personal information was posted online last year after a data breach have reached a settlement in a proposed class-action lawsuit, their attorneys said Wednesday.
The settlement was announced in a filing in a federal lawsuit that was seeking class-action status on behalf of nearly 50,000 current and former Sony employees whose private personal, financial and medical...
